arts.ttl: Lecce 0 – Milan 2 | Allegri’s press conference: “Gimenez can help…”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri, the Rossoneri coach, spoke at the press conference after Lecce-Milan. Milan already yours? “It wasn’t easy to play a match like this in Lecce. We played a good technical game, staying organized and without losing our composure. We could have done better defensively in a few situations, but when you sense danger differently, […]

arts.ttl: Lecce 0 – Milan 2 | Pulisic: “We are a strong group, it’s up to us to show it on the pitch”
arts.sum: Speaking to DAZN, Christian Pulisic spoke after Milan’s victory, largely thanks to his goal, decisive in the second half to “ice” the match. Here are the American’s statements: On AC Milan’s quality: "We know we are a strong group with great quality, it’s up to us to show it on the pitch every match, just […]

arts.ttl: Loftus-Cheek and Pulisic see AC Milan ‘improvement’ in win over Lecce
arts.sum: Ruben Loftus-Cheek praised the Milan ‘mentality to keep pushing’ in their 2-0 victory over Lecce,...

arts.ttl: AC Milan secure first three points of their Serie A campaign with a 0-2 result vs Lecce
arts.sum: A well-deserved win for Milan, who scored twice and had another two goals disallowed. The Rossoneri grew into the match after a sluggish first half hour, aside from Gabbia’s disallowed goal (which looked debatable). Gimenez also saw his effort ruled out, before Loftus-Cheek finally broke the deadlock with a header from a Modric free-kick. Pulisic, […]

arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Lecce 0-2 AC Milan – Modric maestro; Loftus-Cheek responds
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan clinched their first three points of the season with a 2-0 win away at Lecce. Ruben Loftus-Cheek was one of the goalscorers and below are the player ratings for the Rossoneri. If you haven’t already, make sure to check out how we decide the player ratings. arts.ttl: Lecce 0-2 AC Milan: Rossoneri get the job done in difficult fashion
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon AC Milan had to work for their first win of the Serie A season, but they claimed three points with two goals against Lecce. Considering the time between the fixture and the mercato’s end, this was a game in which Milan had to show their true selves, as a collective and as players. arts.ttl: Watch: Pulisic doubles Milan lead in testing game against Lecce
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon In a game where quality has so often lacked, AC Milan got themselves a second goal, thanks to Christian Pulisic. A game devoid of much quality, Milan needed to earn their value against Lecce on Friday night, and they did that. After two disallowed goals and then Ruben Loftus-Cheek’s header, the Rossoneri were on their […] The post Watch: Pulisic doubles Milan lead in testing game against Lecce appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Watch: Loftus-Cheek finally gives Milan the lead vs. Lecce after offside calls
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon After a ropey 60 minutes, AC Milan took the lead against Lecce through Ruben Loftus-Cheek, a much needed goal. In a game where Milan needed to start quickly, they did not. Instead, the play was rather ropey for a lot of the game.
